title: Prin Information Design
description: Presents principles and practices guiding the development of emerging digital genres. Emphasis on maximizing the affordances of the computer in organizing and communicating complex information.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1316 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1321 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (LMC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
